mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO problem_tb ( name, type, img, order_number, update_date, test_id ) VALUES (#{name}, #{type}, #{img}, #{orderNumber}, #{updateDate}, #{testId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE problem_tb SET name=#{name}, type=#{type}, img=#{img}, order_number=orderNumber, update_date=#{updateDate}, test_id=#{testId} WHERE problem_id=#{problemId}
mapper.select: SELECT problem_id, name, type, img, order_number, update_date, test_id FROM problem_tb WHERE problem_id=#{problemId}
SELECT problem_id, name, type, img, order_number, update_date, test_id FROM problem_tb ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT problem_id, name, type, img, order_number, update_date, test_id FROM problem_tb ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay}
